articles.description: BHPian srivatchsan recently shared this with other enthusiasts. Finally, I have the machine with me (XUV 3XO AX5L AT Petrol). It was a fabulous and super quick showroom delivery experience last evening. Of course, there is fantastic traffic on Friday evening.
articles.content:
